name: Armory
description: You conjure an aetheric weapon or ammunition into your hand that has the same stats as the regular version of the weapon, but any energy cost is reduced by 1 when making an attack. This weapon lasts 1 hour. The physical damage from aetheric weapons ignores traits that grant immunity and halving of physical damage.
charge: The weapon lasts until you complete a full rest and gains a bonus dice on all attacks. If you use an aetherium ingot instead of a nugget, the weapon becomes permanent.
